admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Structural Adjustment Loan Project
            will support the implementation of the Government's
            comprehensive structural adjustment program outlined in a
            Letter of Development Policy submitted to the Bank. The
            principal aim of the program is to keep the balance of
            payments manageable while restoring the growth momentum of
            the economy. To achieve these medium-term objectives,
            specific actions will be taken: (i) to save imports
            (particularly energy-related imports); (ii) to promote
            exports and improve industrial efficiency through
            consolidation of investment, further opening of the economy
            and reducing government intervention; and (iii) to
            strengthen domestic resource mobilization efforts. The
            foreign exchange provided by the loan will be used to
            finance essential imports.
